articles.title: Tata Technologies IPO: Company finalises offer price at Rs 500 per share - Business Standard
articles.description: Tata Motors on Saturday said its arm Tata Technologies has finalised the offer price, including the anchor investor offer price, at Rs 500 per equity share for its Initial Public Offering (IPO).
